name: Guitar Factory
description: Build and trade guitars to pave your career path to becoming a rockstar and even use them on stage and in the studio. Detailed options for design and realistic elements for the building process.
developers: Artera Digital Oyun Yazılım ve Pazarlama A.Ş.
publishers: ARTERA DIGITAL OYUN YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
